name: AF

occupation.description: Not a professional soldier, but picked up a weapon when it mattered. Learned to fight from necessity, not training. Good instincts, rough technique.
occupation.name: Militia Member

traits.description: A rugged constitution that refuses to break. +15 Max HP.
traits.name: Hardy

traits.description: Wounds take a long time to clot. Bleeding effects last twice as long.
traits.name: Anemic

traits.description: 10% chance to fail complex manual tasks and waste resources.
traits.name: Clumsy

traits.description: Obsessive focus. Misses secondary objectives more often.
traits.name: Tunnel Vision

traits.description: Hears voices in radio static. Random morale fluctuations.
traits.name: Static Whispers

traits.description: Massive resistance to food poisoning and radiation sickness from water.
traits.name: Iron Gut

traits.description: Broad shoulders meant for heavy lifting. +20% Inventory capacity.
traits.name: Stout

traits.description: Less likely to bleed from minor wounds and environment hazards.
traits.name: Thick Skinned

traits.description: Enjoys socializing with crew. Boosts others morale slightly, but uses 10% more water.
traits.name: Talkative

traits.description: Rarely shares details. Harder for enemies to read you, but crew trust grows slowly.
traits.name: Mysterious

traits.description: The world broke you long ago. Immune to Morale shifts (positive or negative).
traits.name: Stoic Outcast

traits.description: Quickly becomes panicked when HP drops below 40%.
traits.name: Cowardly

traits.description: You can actually read the old manuals. +15% XP Gain.
traits.name: Pre-Ash Scholar
